categories.name: Customers
categories.description: This section contains information about the customers, including their profiles, contact details, and history of interactions.

categories.name: Reviews
categories.description: This space is for managing and viewing customer feedback to reviews related to products.

categories.name: Messages
categories.description: This involves communication channels between clients and the business.

categories.name: Products
categories.description: This section contains details about the products or services offered, including descriptions, pricing, and possibly inventory information.

categories.name: Transactions
categories.description: This includes a record of all sales transactions, providing an overview of purchases, order status, and payment details.

categories.name: Admin
categories.description: This section is dedicated to administrative functions, allowing authorized users to manage the system, set permissions, and perform other administrative tasks. It may include user management, system configuration, and overall control of the platform.
